Package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.grammar

package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.grammar
Contains the grammar used by the Checkstyle framework.

You should not be referring to this package.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle
    Contains the implementation of the Checkstyle framework.
  • Class
    Description
    CommentListener
    This interface is used to be notified by parser about comments in the parsed code.
    CrAwareLexerSimulator
    Extends the LexerATNSimulator class in order to override the 'consume()' method so that we can handle '\r' line endings (pre-OSX macOS line endings) correctly in the ANTLR lexer.
    JavadocCommentsLexerUtil
    Utility class for Javadoc comments lexer operations.
    JavadocCommentsParserUtil
    Utility class for Javadoc comments parser operations.
    SimpleToken
    A simple wrapper for ANTLR Token that provides a proper SimpleToken.equals(Object) and SimpleToken.hashCode() implementation based on the token's type and text.
